scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:modules
scripts.docker: export $(echo $(cat .env | sed 's/#.*//g'| xargs) | envsubst) && docker compose -f 'docker-compose.yml' up --build
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) -f && docker rmi $(docker images -q) -f
scripts.env: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm run docker
scripts.test:docker: export $(echo $(cat .env | sed 's/#.*//g'| xargs) | envsubst) && docker compose -f 'docker-compose.debug.yml' up --build
scripts.test:int: export $(echo $(cat .env | sed 's/#.*//g'| xargs) | envsubst) && npm run test --workspace=@alchemypdf.proc/api.test.int
scripts.test:setup: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm run test:docker
